mapper.select: SELECT id FROM goods ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT gs.id as id, gs.nm as nm, gs.price as price, gs.dprice as dprice, gs.fabric as fabric, ig.path as ImgPath FROM goods gs JOIN category ct ON gs.cateId = ct.cateCode JOIN imgGroup igg ON gs.listImg = igg.id JOIN img ig ON igg.id = ig.imgGroupId WHERE ct.cateCodeRef = #{value} or ct.cateCode = #{value}

SELECT p.id, p.no, p.nm, p.price, p.dprice, p.fabric, p.info, p.descliption, i.nm as imgNm, i.`path` FROM goods p INNER JOIN imgGroup ig ON p.detailImg = ig.id OR p.listImg = ig.id INNER JOIN img i ON ig.id = i.imgGroupId WHERE p.id = #{value}
